data.text:
Description

Our house is located in the heart of the city, in the historic center of the so-called "Athens of Cuba". Just 300 meters from Sauto Theater, national monument, at equal distance from the foundational square of the city "Plaza de la Vigía", which has wiffi area, in front of it is the Firemen Museum, near the same walk of the San Juan River among other attractions.

Close to the house there are museums, restaurants, bars, currency exchange office and excursion office of "HAVANATUR".

In the city you can also enjoy nature tourism, visiting the valley of Yumurí and the famous caves of Bellamar.

In our house we communicate in Spanish and English, we like to meet new people. We love nature and we feel committed to protecting it, due to that we decided to name our hostel "Polymita", alluding to these endemic molluscs of the Cuban fauna, whose shells have the most colorful and exuberant colors, considered one of the most beautiful on the planet .

Rooms

Habitación alquiler

The room has all the comforts: split air conditioning, safe, mattresses with comfort, hot and cold water, double bed and another personal, upholstered armchair, multipurpose table, change of bed linen and daily cleaning, terrace with views to the colonial city.
